OpenidConnectTokenForm#valid? code the code has a null byte is invalid
OpenidConnectTokenForm#valid? code using the same code a second time is invalid
OpenidConnectTokenForm#valid? code with a bad code is invalid
OpenidConnectTokenForm#valid? code code is nil is invalid
OpenidConnectTokenForm#valid? code code has expired is invalid
OpenidConnectTokenForm#valid? neither PKCE nor private_key_jwt params is invalid
OpenidConnectTokenForm#valid? private_key_jwt with a bad client_assertion signed by an unknown key is invalid
OpenidConnectTokenForm#valid? private_key_jwt with a bad client_assertion service provider has no certs registered is has an error
OpenidConnectTokenForm#valid? private_key_jwt with a bad client_assertion with the old audience is invalid
OpenidConnectTokenForm#valid? private_key_jwt with a bad client_assertion with a list of audiences not including the token url is invalid
OpenidConnectTokenForm#valid? private_key_jwt with a bad client_assertion with a bad audience is invalid
OpenidConnectTokenForm#valid? private_key_jwt with a bad client_assertion with no issued time is still valid
OpenidConnectTokenForm#valid? private_key_jwt with a bad client_assertion with a list of audiences including the token url is valid
OpenidConnectTokenForm#valid? private_key_jwt with a bad client_assertion without an audience is invalid
OpenidConnectTokenForm#valid? private_key_jwt with a bad client_assertion with a bad issuer is invalid
OpenidConnectTokenForm#valid? private_key_jwt with a bad client_assertion with an already expired assertion is invalid
OpenidConnectTokenForm#valid? private_key_jwt with a bad client_assertion signed by a second key is still valid
OpenidConnectTokenForm#valid? private_key_jwt with a bad client_assertion with an issued time in the future is invalid
OpenidConnectTokenForm#valid? private_key_jwt with a bad client_assertion with a bad subject is invalid
